name: ImMobileSpy
short_description:
ImMobileSpy Cell Phone Spy is a mobile phone and is the most powerful software allows you to monitor all activities of any iPhone and any Android phone.
This application is easy to install on your phone that you want to monitor. It will upload the information, the process of operation, the exact location of the target phone. You can see by logging into the user area by any ImMobileSpy your computer in just minutes.  This application works in hidden mode, which means it will never be found on the monitored phone.
